private  unknown $_head
          HEADtag object that holds all content for the head.
private  unknown $_head_css_link_arr
          holds an array of LINKtag objects in the head tag that reference an external stylesheet file.
private  unknown $_head_js
          SCRIPTtag object that holds javascript code for the head tag.
private  unknown $_head_js_link_arr
          holds an array of SCRIPTtag objects in the head tag that reference an an extern javascript file.
private  unknown $_head_style
          STYLEtag object that holds css code for the head.
private  unknown $_text_debug
          flag to tell the class to try and change the http headers to output document of type text, instead of html.
private  unknown $_title
          TITLEtag object that holds the title of the page.
